divs: sighting detailsthis happened on saturday night (6\1\13) at approximately 8:30 pm. we were traveling north on mcqueen road and stopped at the intersection of mcqueen and riggs road in chandler, az. i was sitting in the passenger seat and noticed multiple orbs flying low in the sky from the north to the southeast. i quickly jumped out of the truck to capture a video of the event. the video does not do what we witnessed in person any justice. it's hard to tell from the video but these lights were orange\reddish in color and we could not hear any sound coming from them. as they flew by us towards the east more started to appear from the north. i shot 1 minute and 40 seconds before we headed back to the truck to follow them. it took maybe 30-45 seconds to get back onto riggs road heading east and by then all of the lights had completely disappeared.
Summary: Multiple bright red/orange orbs of light were traveling in loose formation in Chandler AZ Sky
